room_title: Escape room "The Chamber" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: This was our first escape room and we had a great time. Did The Chamber with our group of three and had a blast! The only piece we didn't like were the malfunctioning locks that weren't opening with the right combination entered. Otherwise, a must play, challenging and fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Chamber" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: We did the Chamber as a family event and found it very entertaining. The problems were challenging but solvable. Even our seven and nine year old contributed to the solution. We will definitely return!

room_title: Escape room "The Chamber" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: Booked it for my daughter's 16th birthday and her friends had an incredible time!! They did the Chamber and they loved the challenge... they can't wait to do it again!!

room_title: Escape room "The Chamber" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: We had so much fun at Escape the Place today! The puzzles were tricky and challenging. Even though we were not able to get out in time, it was a terrific experience. Thanks to the great staff. We will be back!
